name: Crispy Grilled Shrimp (Prawns) with Lemon Butter Sauce
description: Recipe video above. Seasoned and CRISPY on the outside, juicy on the inside, drizzled with a simple-yet-incredible lemon butter sauce, you'll love the little crispy little golden garlic bits in the sauce! This is a recipe made for the BBQ, but works great on the stove too (Note 4).
recipeIngredient: 3 tsp garlic (, very finely chopped (do not use mincer, Note 1))
1.5 tbsp lemon juice (, plus more to taste)
500g/ 1 lb   large shrimp / prawns (, raw, peeled and deveined (Note 2))
1 tsp smoked paprika ((plain or sweet ok too))
1 tbsp lemon juice ((skip if using stove))

itemListElement.text: Brush BBQ grills with oil, then preheat on high until very hot.
itemListElement.name: Brush BBQ grills with oil, then preheat on high until very hot.

itemListElement.text: If shrimp are small and might fall through grills, skewer them (use 2 skewers, Note 3)
itemListElement.name: If shrimp are small and might fall through grills, skewer them (use 2 skewers, Note 3)

itemListElement.text: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium high heat.
itemListElement.name: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium high heat.

itemListElement.text: Add garlic and salt. Stir until garlic is LIGHT golden brown, then immediately remove from stove (residual heat will make garlic golden & crispy).
itemListElement.name: Add garlic and salt. Stir until garlic is LIGHT golden brown, then immediately remove from stove (residual heat will make garlic golden & crispy).

itemListElement.text: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels (to ensure crispiness!)
itemListElement.name: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels (to ensure crispiness!)

itemListElement.text: Just prior to cooking, place in bowl, sprinkle/drizzle over remaining ingredients. Toss gently to coat.
itemListElement.name: Just prior to cooking, place in bowl, sprinkle/drizzle over remaining ingredients. Toss gently to coat.

itemListElement.text: Working quickly, place shrimp on BBQ and cook each side for 2 minutes until golden and crusty.
itemListElement.name: Working quickly, place shrimp on BBQ and cook each side for 2 minutes until golden and crusty.

itemListElement.text: Immediately remove shrimp onto serving plate.
itemListElement.name: Immediately remove shrimp onto serving plate.

itemListElement.text: Drizzle over all the Lemon Garlic Butter, sprinkle with parsley and serve immediately with fresh lemon.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle over all the Lemon Garlic Butter, sprinkle with parsley and serve immediately with fresh lemon.

itemListElement.text: Crusty bread to mop up the crazy delish butter on the plate is essential!
itemListElement.name: Crusty bread to mop up the crazy delish butter on the plate is essential!

review.reviewBody:
Just made this tonight and it was delicious. 
Like all of your recipes, easy to follow, comprehensive instructions and always yummy! Thank you.

I made this recipe last night with your steak kabob recipe for a New Yearâ€™s Eve surf and turf.  My family raved.  They didnâ€™t just ask for the recipe; they asked for the website so they can try more of your recipes.
Sooo delish and so easy!  Thanks Nagi!

Hi Nagi and  Dozer. I hope you both are well. I  absolutely love your recipe for crispy grilled prawns with lemon and garlic butter sauce. I must admit that I don't like 
large prawns, so I made a little change to the recipe for my taste. Thank you so much for this recipe.....I make this at least twice a month ðŸ’—. Stay safe and well. XOXO, Jo
This is the BEST prawn recipe ever- perfect blend of seasoning- didnt even need sauce...and so so easy! :)

First time I have done this 
Wow superb, I added some chilli as well, will add that to favourite list !
Delicious recipe. Tried this and was great. Family loved the Prawns (or Shrimp)!
OMG is right!  We had this last night and it is hands down the Best Prawn recipe I have ever had!  A 5**** restaurant could not provide a better prawn dish!
Sooo goood!!  Husband and I were racing to go back for more!
